item.title: From futuristic NEOM to tech and tourism, Saudi Arabia's priorities are shifting
item.description: Saudi's economy minister told CNBC the country was "reprioritizing a little bit towards sectors that need it the most."

item.title: Trump’s rare earth deals target China’s dominance — here’s why change won’t come soon
item.description: Trump’s rare-earth push could channel crucial financing and eventually reduce Beijing’s dominance, but the effort will be costly and take years to bea...

item.title: Trump says fentanyl tariff cut, 'farmers,' Nvidia chips up for discussion with Xi as China confirms meeting
item.description: Trump said he expects to lower fentanyl-linked tariffs on China ahead of a much-anticipated meeting with Chinese Xi Jinping in South Korea.

item.title: Private sector created nearly 15,000 jobs a week over the past month, preliminary ADP data shows
item.description: Private sector employers added an average 14,250 jobs per week over the past four weeks, according to new preliminary data from ADP.

item.title: 'Battered and bruised but still standing': WTO chief on global trade after tariffs
item.description: The global trade system has remained resilient despite the U.S.' introduction of import tariffs, the WTO's chief said.
